description: Robyn Cowen and Jerome Sale are joined by ex-Oxford United defender Ben Purkiss and podcaster George Elek to discuss the U's number nine problem.
title: Oxford United podcast: Solving the U's number nine conundrum
title_page: Oxford United podcast: Solving the U's number nine conundrum - BBC Sport
